name: "HORSE INDUSTRIES" BEANIES
description:
ITS THAT TIME OF YEAR AGAIN SO KEEP YOUR HEAD WARM WITH ONE OF THE HORSE BEANIES.

HAND PRINTED, AND STITCHED AT HORSE HQ.

name: "HORSE INDUSTRIES" WINDBREAKER JACKET
description:
IVE WANTED TO MAKE SOME WINDBREAKERS FOR A WHILE NOW BUT IVE WAITED UNTIL I KNEW I COULD MAKE SURE THEY WHERE SPOT ON.

I PRINTED A SAMPLE AND TOOK IT TO THE HORSE PRODUCT TESTING FACILITY (STOCKWELL) AND PUT IT THROUGH A SERIES OF RIGOROUS EVERYDAY CHALLENGES (MOSTLY BS BLUNT SLIDES, FALLING OVER AND SITTING IN THE WINDIEST SPOT WITH A CUP OF TEA) AND I CAN DEFINITELY SAY THAT THEY KEEP YOU WARM, DRY!!

LARGE WHITE BACK PRINT AND AN EMBROIDERED/ PRINTED PATCH ON THE CHEST.DEEP ZIP UP POCKETS AND A HOOD THAT FOLDS AWAY IN TO THE COLLAR SO IT DOESN'T FLAP ABOUT WHEN YOUR SKATING OR DON'T NEED IT UP.


EACH ONE WILL COME WITH STICKERS, A ZINE OR PRINT AND A DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF THE HORSE BOOK 'D.I.Y OR DIE'

name: "HORSE INDUSTRIES" BLACK LONG SLEEVE T-SHIRT
description:
WORLD INDUSTRIES RIPPED OFF ALMOST ALL OF THE BIG NAME COMPANIES YOU CAN THINK OF AND RECEIVED C&D FOR MOST OF THE BOARD GRAPHICS THEY EVER DID. 

I COULD WRITE FOREVER ABOUT THEIR IMPACT ON THE SKATE INDUSTRY AND HOW THEY CHANGED IT FOREVER. BUT INSTEAD, IN THE SPIRIT OF RIPPING BIG COMPANIES OFF I DECIDED TO PRINT A SUPER LIMITED RUN OF SHIRTS, PATCHES AND JACKETS WITH MY VERSION OF THEIR OLD LOGO (LONG BEFORE THE DEVIL, FLAME BOY OR WET WILLY)

LARGE WHITE BACK PRINT AND SMALLER LEFT CHEST PRINT ON BLACK LONG SLEEVE SHIRTS

100% HAND PRINTED AT HORSE HQ

ALL ORDERS COME WITH A FREE PATCH AND DOWNLOADABLE VERSION OF THE FIRST HORSE BOOK.


NOW GO AND WATCH 'THE MAN WHO SOLD THE WORLD' DOCUMENTARY ABOUT STEVE ROCCO!!!!!!
